title.rendered: Tokeny Solutions Expands Further into Europe Through Strategic Recruitment

content.rendered:
Tokeny Solutions has announced Bastiaan Don has joined the leading fintech as Business Development Director. His role will focus on the Swiss, German and Austrian markets.

Bastiaan’s experience lies in the real estate industry, a sector he has spent over 13 years working in. After discovering blockchain technology in 2011, Bastiaan combined the two industries when he founded Token Factory and Blockimmo as tokenization consultancy firms. In 2018, Bastiaan initiated and was invited to chair the Real Estate special interest group within the Enterprise Ethereum Alliance, a role he still holds today.

As part of their vision of digitizing capital markets, Tokeny Solutions has decided to grow their presence further within Europe through the new hire. Founded in 2017, the Luxembourg-based fintech is Europe’s leading provider of tokenization technology. They have worked with over 35 offerings across real estate, debt, equity, funds and utility and welcomed Euronext as their strategic investor last summer. Their success has been recognised with awards from the likes of KPMG, FinTech 50 and most recently Sifted, a list of top European fintechs backed by the Financial Times.

I’m extremely pleased to join Tokeny Solutions, with their quality team, state-of-the-art technology and strategic investor Euronext in place. I look forward to building on this strong foundation to accelerate growth and deliver the best-in-class tokenization services to Swiss, German and Austrian customers.
Bastiaan DonBusiness Development Director at Tokeny Solutions
To properly service the interest we’re receiving across the European financial centers, it’s important we have the level of expertise in place to fulfill this demand. Combined with the requests we’re experiencing in the industry, Bastiaan has the perfect skill set required for us to drive this market forward.
Luc FalempinCEO of Tokeny Solutions
About Tokeny Solutions

Tokeny Solutions enables mid-cap companies, marketplaces, investment banks, funds, asset managers and distributors to dematerialize assets on the blockchain, allowing them to reach a global audience, enforce compliance obligations, enable automation and increase operational efficiency.

The Luxembourg-based FinTech company is the market-leader in delivering an institutional grade, modular end-to-end platform, allowing for the issuance, transfer and servicing management of tradable digital assets/security tokens, such as tokenized loans, structured notes, equity and funds. Tokeny has issued multiple tokenized offerings across five continents with further security offerings imminent.

tokeny.com | Press | LinkedIn | Twitter
